member.name: NMLVODSTATECHANGE
member.summary: Structure that contains information for use in processing the LVN_ODSTATECHANGED notification code.

member.name: NMLVODSTATECHANGE.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

member.name: NMLVODSTATECHANGE.iFrom
member.summary: Zero-based index of the first item in the range of items.

member.name: NMLVODSTATECHANGE.iTo
member.summary: Zero-based index of the last item in the range of items.

member.name: NMLVODSTATECHANGE.uNewState
member.summary: Value indicating the new state for the item or items. This member can be any valid combination of the list-view item states.

member.name: NMLVODSTATECHANGE.uOldState
member.summary: Value indicating the old state for the item or items. This member can be any valid combination of the list-view item states.
